user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, reliable, and discreet underwear that I could wear throughout the day without discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide all-day wearability. The product's description highlighted its softness and durability, which appealed to my need for comfort and reliability. The tag-free feature and 100% cotton liner were also significant factors that influenced my decision, as I prioritize comfort in my daily wear.

I needed breathable underwear that would not show under my clothes. The description emphasized the soft, breathable fabric and the no-show design, which aligned perfectly with my requirements for comfort and discretion. The added feature of X-Temp cooling was a bonus that made me feel confident in my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer exceptional comfort and a good fit. I value soft materials that feel pleasant against the skin, as well as features that enhance usability, such as breathable fabrics and tag-free designs. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be worn in various settings, whether for lounging or active use. Additionally, I tend to favor products that come in attractive colors or styles, as this adds to my overall satisfaction. On the other hand, I dislike items that are poorly sized, flimsy, or lack durability, as these factors detract from the comfort and usability I seek.
